Sentencas: In solid oxide fuel cell operation, electrical current plays an important role in the air electrode interaction with electrolyte and interconnect and long-term cell performance.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells
Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: (La0.8Sr0.2)(x)MnO3 (LSM) air electrodes with different stoichiometries (x = 0.95, 1, and 1.05) are fabricated on the surface of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and then sandwiched with AISI 441 stainless steel interconnect.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The simulated half cells are thermally treated at 800 degrees C for 500 h under a 200 mA cm(-2) current density in dry air.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: YSZ/LSM interfacial interaction and the reaction of volatile chromium species on the LSM surface are characterized.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Different LSM stoichiometry leads to different interfacial reactions and Cr deposition amounts.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Mn is a critical species for the Cr deposition under polarization.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Excessive Mn in LSM lessens the formation of La-containing phase at the YSZ/LSM interface and accelerates Cr deposition.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Deficient Mn in LSM leads to extensive interfacial reaction with YSZ, forming more La-containing phase and inhibiting Cr deposition.
Titulo: Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells
Chromium deposition and interfacial interactions of an electrolyte-air electrode-interconnect tri-layer for solid oxide fuel cells
